name: DORIS
description:
Description:

On New Years' Eve 20XX a spaceship launched from Earth, carrying hundreds of passengers from all over the world. The passengers were to become the first human inhabitants on Mars. But their journey went horribly wrong...

DORIS is a short visual novel made in 26 hours during a game jam I had with some of my friends. The theme was "Forgotten Machine" with the emoji "✝" added after 12 hours.

I didn't have time to review the writing so it's full of spelling and grammatical errors as well as wonky sentences. You have been warned.

How to play:

* Use the left mouse button in order to continue the dialog and make choices.

Thats it :)
